lead_paragraph: An Arizona man charged with planning an attack on a Prophet Muhammad cartoon contest in Texas took the witness stand Tuesday in his own defense, describing how he met the two men who carried out the thwarted shooting.

headline.main: Man Accused of Planning Texas Attack Takes Stand at Trial
headline.print_headline: Man Accused of Planning Texas Attack Takes Stand at Trial

snippet: An Arizona man charged with planning an attack on a Prophet Muhammad cartoon contest in Texas took the witness stand Tuesday in his own defense, describing how he met the two men who carried out the thwarted shooting.
